CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(BusinessArea__c, 'ZK'),ISPICKVAL(BusinessArea__c, 'ZF'),ISPICKVAL(BusinessArea__c, 'ZS')) , '620 - Neunkirchen', IF(ISPICKVAL(BusinessArea__c, 'ZZ'),'473 - Burbach', IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(BusinessArea__c, 'ZW'),ISPICKVAL(BusinessArea__c, 'ZM')) , '460 - Nauweiler', NULL)))
CustomField.label: Quality Department
